text: Further update as of 5 pm 3.27.20, the @PhiladelphiaGov public health lab is now testing for #COVID19, making the total 93 PHLs across the US.

Update as of 3.27.20: There are 92 public health labs across the country testing for #COVID19. There are supply issues that are affecting the lab industry as a whole, but testing is expanding each day.

A friend’s mom and her FIL both died today of #COVID19. She herself is running a fever. Another friend is recovering slowly. PLEASE take this seriously. It hits home. So stay at home. Please take every precaution. For your loved ones.
Here is my blogpost with @mfraserdc1 just published on #COVID19 testing. Many thanks to @Health_Affairs for posting so quickly. https://t.co/TITm5fDyAO
Thank you @NyleDiMarco for sharing this important message. Conserve the #COVID19 tests for the sick, healthcare workers and the elderly. https://t.co/lh5k7UD2jG

I am so impressed with the #laboratory scientists and bioinformaticians in public health labs. Sequencing is key to discovering more about #COVID19 as we move through this pandemic. #ScienceMatters https://t.co/Y5hIJiu0uj

We will figure out other ways to share great #APHL content. And believe me—there will be lots to share when we’re on the other side of #COVID19 —as a lab community and as a nation. In the meantime, keep up social distancing, isolating and #handwashing https://t.co/8rphvEq1Io

Today 4 more local PHLs & Puerto Rico have completed verification and are offering #COVID19 testing.

As of 3.16.20, the total # of verified PH labs offering testing is 89 and includes one or more PHL in 50 states plus DC, Guam & Puerto Rico. The testing network continues to grow
RT @TCBPubHealth: MSDH lab team running COVID-19 tests live shot https://t.co/B7oPIGeKtL
I have talked with my kids and their friends about #COVID19 and the response a lot.  "We will get through this.  Now go wash your hands." https://t.co/wYuaXy4kbI
RT @Google_Comms: Statement from Verily: "We are developing a tool to help triage individuals for Covid-19 testing. Verily is in the early…
@lacyfm @chadhayesmd Pandemics do that to people. Miss you!

Good morning, an @APHL update as of 10 am 3/12/20: Now 81 public health labs (PHLs) up and running in all 50 states. Tests are ongoing as of last night without interruption thx to the efforts of our PHLs. We are working closely w @US_FDA @CDCgov @HHS_ASH  @HHSGov. #COVID19

The past 2 days I embedded @CDCgov alongside two @APHL staff. The energy/determination that everyone is putting forth was palpable. Yes, folks are exhausted but they are all trained for these circumstances.  My sincere admiration for these incredible civil servants. #COVID19 https://t.co/s77DH6rAiB
Diagnostic Testing for the Novel Coronavirus | JAMA | JAMA Network - honored to join ⁦@drJoshS⁩ and ⁦@MichelleM_Mello⁩ in this new article #COVID19  https://t.co/3C1zh41kNN
This is so great, your #PublicHealth partners appreciate boosting these important #COVID19 messages. https://t.co/r2k7TA35WC

This an update on #PublicHealth lab status for #COVID19 across the US as of 10 am 3/9/20: there are 78 state and local public health labs in all 50 states and the District of Columbia have successfully verified and are currently using COVID-19 diagnostic tests. @APHL

A brief reminder to my colleagues on the frontlines of #publichealth, #healthcare, our @aphl staff, journalists & all others responding to #COVID19 —practice self-care please. This is not a sprint but a marathon. Hug your families. Do laundry too. Sleep.
@BrianCCastrucci #NewbornScreening saves lives. #wedomorethancorona

Many thanks to @BloombergTV for having me on to talk about the laboratory response to #COVID19. Yes, it was a tough start but we are a resilient network and have turned the corner. @APHL https://t.co/c5UUmW7vho

Update on US #PublicHealth laboratory system testing: Today 67 PHLs are verified & offering testing, up from 8 a week ago. This includes one or more PHL in 45 states; there are 13 addl labs in progress, 4 of which anticipate being up by the weekend.  #COVID19 @APHL  1/

As of tonight, there are 31 #PublicHealth laboratories across the country able to test for #coronavirus with 10 more expected over the rest of the weekend. Then next week @CDCgov sends more test kits & we’ll have 100+ labs ready.
